action_description: This Action will set your Easy Control to manual mode.
This Action will set the current room temperature to a level of your choice. This temperature level can be adjusted manually or if Clock Mode is activated.
This Action will set your Easy Control to auto mode.The auto mode (e.g. clock mode, holiday mode) sets the temperatures accordingly.
This Action will increase the room temperature by a configurable amount.
This Action will decrease the room temperature by a configurable amount.
This Action will set your Easy Control to away mode.
This Action will set your Easy Control to home mode.
